setting.name: SIPXCHANGE_DOMAIN_NAME
setting.label: Domain name
setting.description: Domain responsible for handling SIP. Enter the fully qualified host name if DNS SRV is *not* configured to send all SIP traffic to the SIP proxy on this machine. This controls how SIP addresses are built and used throught the system for example sip:user@old-value becomes sip:user@new-value. Changing this value can have various side effects depending on how your system is setup.

setting.name: VOICEMAIL_AGE_LIMIT
setting.label: VoiceMail expiration
setting.description: Number of days voice mail messages will be kept on the system.

setting.name: EXTENSION_LENGTH
setting.label: Maximum internal extension length
setting.description: Longest internal extension in the system dialing plan. When user is prompted by autoattendant to enter extension this value is used to determine if entire extension has been entered.

setting.name: SMTP_SERVER
setting.label: SMTP server
setting.description: IP address or DNS name of SMTP server used for Voice Mail notification

setting.name: SIP_REGISTRAR_GLOBAL_CALL_PICKUP_CODE
setting.label: Global call pickup code
setting.description: Code to dial to pick up a ringing call on any phone. Set it to empty to disable global call pickup.

setting.name: SIP_REGISTRAR_DIRECTED_CALL_PICKUP_CODE
setting.label: Directed call pickup code
setting.description: Code to dial to pick up a ringing call on a specific phone. To pick up extension 123, dial this code followed by 123.

setting.name: SIP_REGISTRAR_CALL_RETRIEVE_CODE
setting.label: Call park retrieve code
setting.description: Code to dial to retrieve a parked call. Dial this code followed by a call park extension to pick up a parked call.

setting.name: SIP_REGISTRAR_CALL_PICKUP_WAIT
setting.label: Call pickup timeout
setting.description: Number of seconds that the original call will ring after the pickup code is dialed.

setting.name: SIP_PRESENCE_SIGN_IN_CODE
setting.label: Presence sign in
setting.description: Code to dial to sign in to the presence monitor.

setting.name: SIP_PRESENCE_SIGN_OUT_CODE
setting.label: Presence sign out
setting.description: Code to dial to sign out from the presence monitor.

setting.name: PRESENCE_SERVER_SIP_PORT
setting.label: SIP port
setting.description: The IP port on which the presence server listens to SIP messages.

setting.name: SIP_PRESENCE_DOMAIN_NAME
setting.label: Presence server location
setting.description: Presence server location. Used when generating presence server aliases.

setting.name: SIP_PRESENCE_HTTP_PORT
setting.label: Presence server location
setting.description: Presence server XML-RPC API port.

setting.name: SIP_AUTHPROXY_LOG_LEVEL
setting.label: Authorization Proxy Log Level
setting.description: Authorization and permission handling.

setting.name: SIP_PROXY_LOG_LEVEL
setting.label: Proxy Log Level
setting.description: Dispatching of SIP traffic.

setting.name: SIP_REGISTRAR_LOG_LEVEL
setting.label: Registrar Log Level
setting.description: Handling of phones registering for calls.

setting.name: SIP_PARK_LOG_LEVEL
setting.label: Park Server Log Level
setting.description: Handling of calls getting parked and picked up.

setting.name: SIP_STATUS_LOG_LEVEL
setting.label: Status Server Log Level
setting.description: Handling of SUBSCRIBE/NOTIFY messages for voicemail notification control (MWI)

setting.name: SIP_PRESENCE_LOG_LEVEL
setting.label: Presence Server Log Level
setting.description: Monitoring presence events.

setting.name: SIP_CALLRESOLVER_DAILY_RUN
setting.label: Schedule to run Call Resolver daily
setting.description: Schedule a daily automatic run of Call Resolver.

setting.name: SIP_CALLRESOLVER_DAILY_START_TIME
setting.label: Start time of Call Resolver 24 hour time frame
setting.description: Start time of the 24 hour time frame in which Call resolver will attempt call resolution.

setting.name: SIP_AUTHPROXY_CALL_STATE_DB
setting.label: Authorization Proxy Call State Event Logging
setting.description: Logging call state events to SQL database.

setting.name: SIP_PROXY_CALL_STATE_DB
setting.label: Forking Proxy Call State Event Logging
setting.description: Logging call state events to SQL database.

setting.name: SIP_CALLRESOLVER_LOG_LEVEL
setting.label: Call Resolver Log Level
setting.description: Resolving call state events into Call Detail Records.

setting.name: SIP_CALLRESOLVER_CALL_DIRECTION
setting.label: Call Direction Processing
setting.description: Enable Call Direction processing of Call Detail Records.
